alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Hill; Johnson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 10:14PM CDT until April 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Johnson County in north central Texas... Northwestern Hill County in central Texas... Northwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1013 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Pat Cleburne, or 7 miles south of Cleburne, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Cedar Hill, Waxahachie, Cleburne, Midlothian, Keene, Alvarado, Venus, Grandview, Maypearl, Blum, Covington, Lake Pat Cleburne, Parker, Rio Vista, Coyote Flats, Sand Flat, Griffith and Forreston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 9 and 31. Interstate 35E between mile markers 389 and 392. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
